programme.sub-title: Um fogo que não se apaga

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Um dia, os moradores de South Park acordam e descobrem que estão sem Internet. Randy descobre que ainda há Internet na Califórnia e junto com a sua família, eles se dirigem para o Oeste do país.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Chegou a hora da corrida de pinhos em South Park e Stan e Randy estão trabalhando duro para construir o melhor carro. Enquanto trabalha no carro de corrida, Randy adquire um componente muito especial para garantir o primeiro lugar de Stan.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos fazem um perfil de Stan no Facebook contra a sua vontade. Stan acaba ficando de saco cheio com os pedidos de amizade e tenta deletar seu perfil, mas ele acaba sendo sugado para dentro do mundo virtual do Facebook.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan sofre de transtorno de acúmulo de bugigangas e, juntamente, com o Sr. Mackey, aceita ser tratado por especialistas. Stan entra no mundo dos sonhos

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A vida de Stan está um verdadeiro desastre, tanto em casa quanto na escola. Enquanto isso, a obsessão de Randy com a comida está mudando tudo, e inclusive faz com que Sharon descubra novos interesses.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ao completar 10 anos de idade, a visão do mundo de Stan muda e também suas amizades.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan está tentando fazer com que sua vida volte ao normal e acaba descobrindo algo terrível. Enquanto isso, Cartman faz o melhor hambúrguer da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman lança seu próprio canal de vendas de joias na televisão. Isso gera um negócio bastante lucrativo, já que as joias, na verdade, são falsas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Butters é vítima de um bullying improvável. Agora ele quer conscientizar os demais alunos sobre os perigos do bullying e, para isso, ele faz um grande vídeo de dança.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O mundo está abalado pela recente notícia do uso de drogas por um ícone amado, e todos estão se sentindo perdidos e traídos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos tentam impedir que seus pais machuquem uns aos outros usando como distração o jogo Minecraft.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan fica viciado no mais recente aplicativo do Terrance e Phillip. Enquanto os próprios Terrance e Phillip não estão se sentindo bem sobre a fortuna que eles estão fazendo em seu novo jogo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Randy vê uma oportunidade de sucesso para a Fazenda Tegridade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes saem para caçar com Jimbo, o tio de Stan, e seu velho amigo vietnamita Ned. Enquanto isso, um monstro misterioso que vive na montanha os ameaça e um vulcão bem próximo a South Park está a ponto de sofrer uma erupção.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan tem um novo cachorro chamado Sparky, que ao que tudo indica, é gay. Isso vira motivo de piada entre seus amigos. Quando Sparky foge, Stan vai ao Santuário de Animais do Grande Gay Al e aprende algumas coisas sobre a homossexualidade.
programme.sub-title: Grande cruzeiro do Big Gay Al

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O avô de Stan está fazendo 102 e quer se matar, mas como não pode fazer isso sozinho, pede a ajuda de Stan. Enquanto isso, a senhora Broflovski protesta contra um famoso programa da televisão um tanto quanto inapropriado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A tia Flo está de visita e dá um presente para Stan: um peixe medonho. Com o tempo, começam a aparecer alguns cadáveres por aí, e a mãe de Stan tenta fingir que não tem nada a ver.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Vários habitantes de South Park estão ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razão aparente. Randy é o principal responsável para descobrir uma solução para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereção".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan tem que ir com os seus pais para uma festa chata repleta dos alunos menos populares do colégio, como Butters, Pip e Dougie. Enquanto isso, Randy e Gerald passam por uma situação um tanto quanto incômoda em uma jacuzzi.
programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Já que Butters parece encaixar tão bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que não é nada experiente, se vê forçado a competir contra um campeão de ski.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan fuma uns cigarros de maconha que uns rapazes mais velhos deixaram e, pela noite, aparece um homem de 32 anos perdido e drogado que diz ser o Stan do futuro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Um novo aluno mórmon se muda à South Park, mas não se dá bem com ninguém. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Wendy termina o seu relacionamento com Stan, e para ajudá-lo, os meninos o levam a um restaurante famoso por suas asas de frango e suas belas garçonetes. Mas o plano não funciona e Stan se une a um grupo de góticos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os protetores dos animais se manifestam contra o uso de uma vaca como mascote da escola, e os estudantes se veem forçados a buscarem uma nova mascote, o que gera um conflito entre Cartman e Kyle, já que ambos tem ideias diferetes.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan se encontra com alguns lindos animaizinhos do bosque, que pedem para ele alguns favores inocentes. Após ajudar todos eles, Stan descobre que na verdade eles tem um plano para trazer o anticristo para o mundo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Cartman acabam inundando um dos vilarejos próximos a South Park. Como resultado, a cidade de South Park é declarada em estado de emergência, já que todos acham que isso é obra do aquecimento global.
programme.sub-title: Dois dias antes de depois de amanhã

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan estava buscando algo "divertido e grátis" para passar o tempo e aceita fazer um teste de personalidade oferecido por uns cientologistas e descobre que o seu "nível de alma" é surpreendentemente alto.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Agora Stan é o novo treinador de um time de hockey infantil e tenta fazer com que eles ganhem tudo. Enquanto isso, seu pai precisa lidar com a recordação do terrível desempenho de Stan em uma partida há alguns anos atrás.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan quer saber a verdadeira razão para as crianças decorarem os ovos de Páscoa e o que ovos e coelhos tem a ver com a morte de Jesus. Para chegar à verdade, Kyle e Stan se envolvem com uma sociedade bizarra que guarda um segredo lendário.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão em um dia de passeio pelo planetário e um dos funcionários lava o cérebro deles com efeitos visuais para que eles queiram voltar para lá.
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert deveria demitir os alimentos gordurosos

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Todos acham que Cartman está muito gordo e decidem enviá-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny está topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva às mais diversas insanidades.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Scott Tenorman é um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele fará o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participação especial: Radiohead.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman recebe como herança de sua avó um milhão de dólares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diversão somente para ele, no qual ele não precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, já que ninguém mais pode entrar.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o máximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabeça e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polícia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psíquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinários.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. Ao ser ignorado por todos, ele começa a pensar que está morto e que agora é um fantasma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caçar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajudá-lo nesta missão, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge César Millan, um adestrador de cães que aceita o desafio.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evolução em aula, mesmo que isso vá totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lançam o seu novo videogame preferido.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. Ele acaba despertando apenas 500 anos mais tarde, em um futuro nada agradável, e o pior de tudo: sem Nintendo Wii!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman faz uma brincadeira que terminou com um mal-entendido envolvendo seu pai e uma posição um tanto quanto constrangedora. Agora, Butters deve ir a um acampamento de cura gay.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após ver um garoto com Síndrome de Tourette em uma loja, Cartman fica obcecado por isso. Ele descobre que se aparentar ter a doença Tourette, ele poderá dizer o que quiser sem precisar encarar consequências.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Depois de receber um resultado inesperado ao realizar um exame de amígdalas, Cartman fica cara a cara com sua própria mortalidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Em tempos de aflição e grande desespero, um jovem de South Park decide manter a ordem na cidade. Surge Guaxinim, que se torna o vigilante solitário de South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O sonho de Cartman de viver a vida de um pirata se tornará realidade, se ele conseguir chegar à Somália.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman é escolhido para fazer os anúncios da manhã na escola de South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O restaurante favorito de Cartman foi fechado e substituído por uma loja que vende maconha medicinal. Enquanto Randy quer conseguir uma prescrição médica para comprar maconha, Cartman fará de tudo para ter de volta sua amada galinha frita.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman quer se tornar um corredor da NASCAR, mas ele acha que não tem condições porque não é "pobre e suficientemente estúpido" para alcançar seus sonhos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman tem um ataque de raiva quando os tamanhos dos pênis dos garotos são colocados no mural da escola de South Park e acabda sendo enviado para uma terapia de controle da raiva.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Noventa e nove por cento dos alunos estão contra Eric Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finalmente admite que é gordo e providencia imediatamente uma scooter para se locomover.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman consegue se infiltrar na agência de segurança nacional.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Token é considerado por Cartman uma ameaça a toda a humanidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos criam uma empresa na qual eles não fazem nada, e enfim optam pelo nome "The Washington Redskins".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha seu próprio banheiro dizendo que ele é "transginger" claro significado de transgenero.Segredo de Randy é revelado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman foi diagnosticado com ansiedade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman conta para seus amigos sobre o seu sonho em que apareciam uns alienígenas que o abduzem e lhe introduzem uma sonda anal. Mas ao que parece, não foi apenas um sonho, já que algo está enlouquecendo as vacas deste pequeno vilarejo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha o concurso "Salve o nosso frágil planeta" e é anunciado que Kathie Lee Gifford viajará a South Park para entregar o prêmio a ele em mãos, então, Cartmam decide entrar em forma tomando as pastilhas de Aumento 4000.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman descobre a verdadeira identidade do seu pai. Uma tempestade de neve prende os garotos no hospital. A equipe do America’s Most Wanted está na cidade. A equipe e os moradores ficam isolados e consideram o canibalismo.
programme.sub-title: A Mãe do Cartman Continua Sendo uma Vaca

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: The Seven Year Itch
programme.desc: With his family away for their annual summer holiday, New Yorker Richard Sherman (Tom Ewell) decides he has the opportunity to live a bachelor's life. The beautiful but ditsy blond (Marilyn Monroe) from the apartment above his catches his eye.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer star in this successful sequel to The Pink Panther in which Inspector Clouseau tries to prove a beautiful parlor maid is innocent of killing her chauffer lover.

programme.title: It's A Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: Indiscreet
programme.desc: Cary Grant is the suave American diplomat who pretends to be married in order to preserve his bachelor status. Ingrid Bergman is the glamorous leading lady of the London stage who has no scruples about having an affair with a married man.

programme.title: Pardners
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: How To Succeed In Business Without Really Trying
programme.desc: This hilarious musical stars Robert Morse as a charming and scheming window washer who climbs to the top of the corporate ladder by way of a self-help book.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: Xander Cage is a notorious underground thrill-seeker deemed untouchable by the law. But when NSA Agent Gibbsons convinces Cage to infiltrate a ruthless Russian crime ring, this new breed of secret agent takes down the enemies of justice with a vengeance.

programme.title: XXX: State of the Union
programme.desc: Darius Stone is a thrill-seeking troublemaker whose criminal record and extreme sports obsession make him the perfect candidate to be the newest xXx agent. He must save the U.S. government from a conspiracy led by Secretary of Defense George Deckert.

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: In the fast-paced crime drama Running Scared, Paul Walker plays a low-level mobster who, in order to save his family, must recover a gun used in a mob hit before it's found by his bosses or the cops.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: Accident Man
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation
programme.desc: Heather Mason and her father have always tried to stay one step ahead of the malevolent forces intent on their destruction. But on the eve of her 18th birthday, a dangerous revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: The Sound
programme.desc: A skeptic of the supernatural (Rose McGowan) uses soundwaves to debunk paranormal activities. But her skepticism is tested while investigating the dark depths of a haunted subway station - where a terrifying evil awaits! Christopher Lloyd co-stars.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Following a mysterious disappearance on a jump, a group of skydivers experience paranormal occurrences that leave them fighting for their lives.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Faculty
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: Death Note: Rebirth
programme.desc: Brilliant but bored high school student Light Yagami suddenly finds himself holding the power of life and death in his hand, the power of the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Death Note: Unraveling
programme.desc: Light meets a woman at the Police Department with an urgent message for the Kira task force.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Beast
programme.desc: Jun Fudo is taken by a mysterious woman and finds herself being attacked by a werewolf-like creature. As she tries to save herself, she transforms into Devil Lady.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Blood
programme.desc: Jun tries to regain some sense of normalcy as she resumes her modeling career but finds herself yet again struggling to come to terms with her true identity.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Wings
programme.desc: A mysterious boy appears in front of Jun one night, proclaiming that he'll kill Jun's lover then disappears in to the darkness. Fearing that Kazumi is in danger, Jun hurries to Kazumi's home.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Embryo
programme.desc: As Jun breaksdown and confess her struggles of being the Devil Lady, Lan Asuka appears once again to take Jun to a military compound.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Takeru is visited by the evil Emperor Zule of Planet Gishin, who claims to be his father in his dreams.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: To find out the truth, Takeru visits his parents' home. There, his father, Professor Myojin reveals Takeru is not his biological son.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: After analyzing Gaia's command capsule, Commissioner Otsuka discovers its secret. While the other Crasher Squad members leave for battle, Takeru is ordered to stay behind and is kept in confinement.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: The other Crasher Squad members are suspicious of Takeru, due to his Esper power and mysterious ability to control Gaia. Now, Takeru must face the Gishin assassin alone.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: After hearing his fellow Crasher Squad members say they cannot fight alongside a Gishinian, Takeru takes off into space with Gaia.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: The Gishinians finally discover where the Six God robots are stationed. They attack Egypt where Sphinx, the body unit of God Mars, is located.
programme.sub-title: The Six Gods, Unable To Combine?!

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: A giant space fleet has left Earth to construct a base on Pluto and the Crasher Squad has been assigned to guard the fleet. However, Takeru hears a mysterious voice in his head urging him not to go to Pluto.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Takeru bombs the Spaceport and a young boy, who admires Takeru, witnesses him in the act. With pictures to prove his guilt, Takeru is taken into custody.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon departs on a journey to take the Hunter Exam and meets Leorio and Kurapika who also want to be Hunters.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: If Gon, Leorio and Kurapika cannot answer an old woman's question correctly, they will be immediately disqualified.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Escorted by the Kiriko the trio finally arrive at the exam site.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The exam for the First Phase consists of following Satotz, the proctor to the site of the Second Phase.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Misty wetlands await the participants as they emerge from the long tunnel. Visibility is poor and various monsters lie in wait.
programme.sub-title: Hisoka x Is So x Sneaky

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Proctors Menchi and Buhara's test consists of preparing a dish that will satisfy the palate of Gourmet Hunters.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Netero challenges Gon and Killua to a simple game. If they win, they earn the right to become Hunters.
programme.sub-title: Showdown x On x The Airship

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER

programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Limitless

programme.desc: Naruto, Sakura and Sasame are attacked by Kamikiri, Jigumo and Kagero of the Fuma Clan.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

programme.title: Drive
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: A crew of officers at an armored transport security firm embark on the ultimate heist – against their own company. The seemingly fool-proof plan soon proves to be useless when an unexpected witness interferes, as the plan quickly unravels.

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Jamesy Boy
programme.desc: Rage-filled teenager James is never one to back down from a fight. He jumps at the chance to run drugs and guns for a gang and quickly ends up behind bars.

programme.title: The Kill Room
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: The con is on when scam artists and lovers Irving Rosenfeld and Sydney Prosser are entrapped by ambitious FBI agent Richie DiMaso and coerced into participating in a sting operation that hinges on snaring politician Carmine Polito and his associates.

programme.title: Becks
programme.desc: After a crushing breakup with her girlfriend, a Brooklyn musician moves back in with her Midwestern mother. As she navigates her hometown, playing for tip money in an old friend's bar, an unexpected relationship begins to take shape.

programme.title: Stonewall
programme.desc: Passions and politics make a volatile mix in this dynamic drama directed by Roland Emmerich that follows the events that led to the birth of the modern Gay Rights movement.

programme.title: A Single Man
programme.desc: A day in the life of a college professor; recently widowed after a sixteen-year marriage.

programme.title: My Days of Mercy
programme.desc: After a female activist protesting the death penalty befriends a woman with opposing views, they begin a passionate relationship that tests their beliefs and their values.

programme.title: The Intervention
programme.desc: When four couples meet for a weekend away together, an attempt to run a “marriage intervention” goes hilariously wrong as everyone is forced to confront the secrets and fears that seem to be holding them back from finding happiness with each other,

programme.title: Weekend
programme.desc: A drunken one-night stand turns into a deeper romance over the course of a booze, drug, and sex-filled weekend.

programme.title: Teen Witch
programme.desc: One week before her sixteenth birthday, a girl realizes that she is the descendant from one of the witches of Salem. She uses her newfound powers to snag herself the football-hero as her boyfriend and to become the most popular girl in school.

programme.title: Purple Rain
programme.desc: Headstrong, vulnerable young musician The Kid (Prince) struggles with his own inner demons and with his alcoholic father who beats his mother. But the madness infects his music, fueling a sound that transforms the struggling, young rocker into a star.

programme.title: Hollywood Shuffle
programme.desc: In the style of KENTUCKY FRIED MOVIE, writer-director Robert Townsend lampoons Hollywood's perception of blacks--and racial stereotypes in general.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Jules Potter reluctantly realizes she is in love with her best friend Michael. There is just one catch: he's about to marry someone else. Jules will do anything to steal him back... except tell him the simple truth.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Jawbreaker
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Gene Hackman, Dennis Quaid and Richard Dreyfuss star in Mike Nichols' hilarious blockbuster film about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of today's Hollywood. Rated: R

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Coffy
programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Foxy Brown
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Convoy
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Brannigan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael appears to be creating an opening for the Pharaoh's counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.sub-title: Yamato’s Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.sub-title: Marco’s Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
programme.sub-title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!
programme.sub-title: Otama’s Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
programme.sub-title: Sanji’s Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
programme.sub-title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
programme.sub-title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him.
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors’ Deadly Attack!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
programme.sub-title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
programme.sub-title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Law’s Sword Technique!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
programme.sub-title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After surviving a terrible storm to reach the entrance to the Red Line, Luffy slugs a mysterious sea monster and Sanji may finally get to meet a mermaid!
programme.sub-title: HALFWAY ACROSS THE GRAND LINE / ARRIVAL AT THE RED LINE!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and the Straw Hats agree to help a mermaid rescue her friend, but the mission gets dangerous when a gang of flying fish dive bomb their boat!
programme.sub-title: HE HATES THE STRAW HAT CREW / IRON MASKED DUVAL MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats agree to join Camie's rescue mission, but her captured friend turns out to be a dangerous enemy from the past!
programme.sub-title: THE FATED REUNION! SAVE THE CAPTIVE FISHMAN

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats wage a death-defying battle with a group of flying fish, and Luffy is shocked by the familiar face of their latest enemy!
programme.sub-title: TRAGEDY! THE TRUTH HIDDEN UNDER DUVAL'S MASK

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji squares off against his lookalike, Camie shows off just how fast a mermaid can swim, and Luffy defeats a giant bull without even landing a blow!
programme.sub-title: EXPLOSION! SUNNY'S SUPER-SECRET WEAPON, GAON CANNON

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After their showdown with Duval, Luffy and the Straw Hats enjoy a hearty meal before proceeding to the site of their next adventure – an island bursting with bubbles!
programme.sub-title: DISEMBARKING WITH SIGHTS SET ON FISH-MAN ISLAND / THE SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel, but it's not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention.
programme.sub-title: TYRANNY! THE RULERS OF SABAODY, THE CELESTIAL DRAGONS

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters – eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
programme.sub-title: THE TARGET IS CAMIE!! THE LOOMING CLUTCHES OF A PROFESSIONAL KIDNAPPER

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they'll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish!
programme.sub-title: RESCUE CAMIE / THE ARCHIPELAGO'S LINGERING DARK HISTORY

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami's concocted a very generous plan!
programme.sub-title: TIME LIMIT / THE HUMAN AUCTION BEGINS

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats join forces with Kidd's crew and Trafalgar's mates to make short work of the marines, but they're in for a surprise when they encounter a Warlord of the Sea!
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE SIEGE! THE NAVY VS. THE THREE CAPTAINS

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh's house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger's ship.
programme.sub-title: ROGER AND RAYLEIGH - THE KING OF THE PIRATES AND HIS RIGHT HAND MAN

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Admiral Kizaru has arrived to lead the marines on a mission to wipe out all pirates. Meanwhile, Luffy and his crew prepare for a deadly battle with one of the Warlords of the Sea!
programme.sub-title: NO ESCAPE!? ADMIRAL KIZARU'S LIGHT SPEED KICK!!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Phantoma Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Phantoma, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Kannon statuette.
programme.sub-title: Detective Hanshichi, The Tenth Year Promise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's super computer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Aurora Droplet, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.
programme.sub-title: The Face of Goodbye at the National Border

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious World of Madame X

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Here comes Beauty, the assassin hired by ICPO Headquarters to knock off Lupin! Overwhelmed by Beauty's powerful DumDum bullets, Lupin narrowly escapes with his life thanks to Jigen's quick thinking.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's Great Journey to the West

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Pops Fell in Love With

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.
programme.sub-title: A Classical Thief and a Myna

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Isamu Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!
programme.sub-title: Through the Flowers or Storms, The Thieves Race

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his jewelry collection, disregarding the rumor that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Dress Doesn't Suit Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko calls Lupin from Professor Pot's lab, but since Lupin is half-asleep, Jigen takes the call instead. Fujiko claims Professor Pot has accidentally invented a robot that manufactures diamonds, but Jigen doesn't believe a word she says and hangs up.
programme.sub-title: Diamon's Shining in the Robot's Eye

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes to prison intent on making Silver tell what he did with the loot, only to discover that a new top-of-the-line prison was built over the site where he hid the money. Will the operation to trade an execution for the recovery of the money succeed?
programme.sub-title: The Last Gift in Prison is Cup Ramen

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: O Vigilante Mascarado
programme.desc: Um pastor e lutador profissional aceita um cargo em uma igreja em dificuldades, onde ele ajuda a comunidade tanto em sua capacidade oficial quanto como seu alter ego.

programme.title: 6 Balas
programme.desc: Quando a filha de um lutador de MMA é sequestrada, há somente um homem que pode ajudar a encontrá-la – um notório ex-mercenário, cujo boatos, levou seis tiros no peito.

programme.title: O Novato
programme.desc: Quando o erro de um agente novato custa a vida de toda a sua equipe, ele é forçado a fugir e deve descobrir a verdade, recriando os eventos da missão malfadada com apenas a gravação de áudio para guiá-lo.

programme.title: Congelado
programme.desc: Durante um jantar, Robert é sequestrado pela máfia russa e acorda na câmara frigorífica de um restaurante. Ele descobre que o confundiram com outro homem, que deve muito dinheiro aos criminosos. Lá dentro, Robert encontra um policial ferido que pode ser a solução para o problema.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Num futuro em que um experimento fracassado matou quase todas as pessoas, um novo sistema de classes emerge.

programme.title: Megalodon
programme.desc: Uma embarcação militar em busca de um submersível não identificado se depara com um tubarão gigante, forçado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da monstruosa fera.

programme.title: O Vigilante Mascarado
programme.desc: Um pastor e lutador profissional aceita um cargo em uma igreja em dificuldades, onde ele ajuda a comunidade tanto em sua capacidade oficial quanto como seu alter ego.

programme.title: 6 Balas
programme.desc: Quando a filha de um lutador de MMA é sequestrada, há somente um homem que pode ajudar a encontrá-la – um notório ex-mercenário, cujo boatos, levou seis tiros no peito.

programme.title: O Novato
programme.desc: Quando o erro de um agente novato custa a vida de toda a sua equipe, ele é forçado a fugir e deve descobrir a verdade, recriando os eventos da missão malfadada com apenas a gravação de áudio para guiá-lo.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Num futuro em que um experimento fracassado matou quase todas as pessoas, um novo sistema de classes emerge.

programme.title: Os Dez Mandamentos
programme.desc: Moisés ouve a voz de Deus vinda de uma Acácia de Fogo, que o inspira a confrontar o faraó do Egito.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Moises
programme.desc: O rei do Egito é avisado da profecia de que Messias chegará. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebês do sexo masculino.

programme.title: Trenk, O Cavaleiro Trapalhão
programme.desc: Trenk quer tornar-se um cavaleiro e liberar sua família. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do dragão e é condecorado pelo Duque.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro
programme.desc: Quando Mats encontra um par de calças que contém uma quantidade ilimitada de dinheiro no bolso a vida

programme.title: Dummie A Múmia e a Tumba de Achnetut
programme.desc: Dummie está com saudades de casa e quer voltar para visitar o túmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Sharky, o Pequeno Pirata
programme.desc: Destemido e cheio de risadas. O Capitão Sharky e sua animada tripulação partem para aventuras emocionantes e assustadoras, nas quais aprendem que, mais do que ser o pirata mais temível, é preciso ser um bom amigo

programme.title: Bons Pra Cachorro
programme.desc: Uma história de amizade e aventura entre Josh, um cão do campo desalinhado, descontraído e amigável, e Cassie, uma cadela mimada da cidade, que não gosta da vida no campo. Eles logo descobrem que não são tão diferente do que imaginavam e, juntos, formam uma grande equipe para proteger seu lar

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma história da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela é filha do Rei.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Minha Vida
programme.desc: Com a ajuda de um anjo da guarda, uma adolescente rica e mimada aprende que o verdadeiro valor está em ajudar os outros.

programme.title: O Cachorro que salvou o Verão
programme.desc: Quando o cão Zeus destrói uma importante festa da família Bannister, ele é enviado para uma escola de treinamento. As crianças Bannister contam com a ajuda de um treinador, que tem seus próprios métodos de treinamento. Será que as novas habilidades de Zeus poderão ajudá-lo a frustrar um trio de ladrões desastrados determinados a fazer deste um verão irritante?

programme.title: O Dom da Premonição
programme.desc: Annie Wilson (Cate Blanchett) uma viúva e mãe de três filhos, que possui também dons psíquicos. Para ganhar dinheiro, Annie resolve utilizar seus poderes oferecendo leituras psíquicas aos moradores da cidade onde reside, o que lhe custa a desconfiança da ala mais conservadora da população. Porém, tudo começa a piorar para Annie quando ela começa também a ver o lado negro das pessoas sua volta, ao mesmo tempo em que ocorre um assassinato na cidade. Com isso, ela precisará utilizar seus dons psíquicos para auxiliar a polícia local a solucionar o assassinato.

programme.title: O Jogo do Abismo
programme.desc: Uma caça ao tesouro em um cruzeiro se tornará uma luta pela sobrevivência para Liu e o namorado.

programme.title: Assassinatos do Passado
programme.desc: Um detetive trabalha para resolver um caso envolvendo um jovem surdo e um site de voyerismo que funciona em uma casa que pertenceu a um assassino em série.

programme.title: Obsessão
programme.desc: Catherine volta à sua antiga propriedade, onde é forçada a enfrentar o passado misterioso de sua família.

programme.title: Sobrevivente
programme.desc: Um casal em uma caminhada desolada se perdeu irremediavelmente dentro do território de um urso negro agressivo.

programme.title: Maré Negra
programme.desc: Mergulhador profissional retorna após 1 ano em um encontro quase fatal com um grande tubarão branco.

programme.title: Estranho, mas verdade
programme.desc: Uma jovem está passando pelo momento de maior complexidade em toda a sua vida: cinco anos após a morte de seu namorado ela misteriosamente ficou grávida dele. Sem nenhuma explicação de como isso ocorreu, decide procurar a família dele com a ideia de que o filho é mesmo do rapaz, mas com isso acabará descobrindo a verdade sobre tudo.

programme.title: À Procura
programme.desc: A PROCURA, estrelado por Ryan Reynolds, Matthew, pai de Cass, uma garota seqüestrada, que está agora com 17 anos, e ela ainda está viva. Em uma corrida terrível contra o tempo, Matthew, os detetives e até mesmo Cass devem desempenhar as suas partes para resolver o mistério de seu desaparecimento e liberação do cativeiro

programme.title: Assassinatos do Passado
programme.desc: Um detetive trabalha para resolver um caso envolvendo um jovem surdo e um site de voyerismo que funciona em uma casa que pertenceu a um assassino em série.

programme.title: Maré Negra
